Text:
I can only seed this at 10Mbps. I really hope others as they download this can seed at higher speeds. 

You may find the video is very grainy (this movie was shot using a real film camera) and high definition can get all the grains that a DVD can't.

http://www.doblu.com/2010/06/10/war-of-the-worlds-2005-review/
Check the screen shots on that site and you can see the grains that I'm talking about, its in the source.
